page.title: 02A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: MY NAME IS BRETT LUCKHURST,I LIVE AT 13 WATERSEND,TEMPLE EWELL,DOVER,KENT.I LIVE IN A FOUR-BEDROOMED HOUSE.ON SCHOOL DAYS MY MOTHER WAKES ME UP AT 7 O'CLOCK.I USUALLY LIE IN BED FOR ABOUT HALF AN HOUR,THEN I PUT ON MY SCHOOL UNIFORM .I THEN HAVE MUSILI,TOAST AND A GLASS OF ORANGE JUICE.I LEAVE FOR SCHOOL AT ABOUT 8.30 BECAUSE I HAVE TO SET UP THE SCHOOL'S LINK 480Z COMPUTER. WE START SCHOOL AT 9.00.OUR TEACHER,MRS.HOUGHTON TAKES THE REGISTER AND THEN WE HAVE PRAYERS.AT SCHOOL WE DO WORK SUCH AS MATHS,ENGLISH,READING AND SPELLING.AT 10.30 WE HAVE BREAK AND 12.00 DINNER.IN THE AFTERNOON WE SOMETIMES DO ART.SCHOOL FINISHES AT 3.1 AND I GO HOME,CHANGE CLOTHES AND GO OUT TO PLAY.
